page.title: 11HOUSING 3 HOMELIFE AMENITIES
page.content: All but one house has a bath. 10 of the 32 houses have two baths and 1 has three. All have w.c.'s 11 have one, 10 have two, 9 have three and 2 have four. 10 houses have seperate showers(including the house without a bath) 29 houses have washing machines and 8 have dishwashers. 28 houses have telephones. This high level of provision of amenites indicates {lifestyles}higher than average living standards are enjoyed by residents. 23 of these 32 houses(72%) have garages 7(22%) have two garages and 2 have three garages. In other words these 32 houses have a total of 46 garages, yet parking on the lanes is a problem because there is an even higher ratio of cars to houses.(See{Transport}P16) All houses have radios, all but one have television. 8 houses have greenhouses and 2 have tennis courts.
